title: Tryndamere's Ult is bugged.
body: Playing Tryndamere and I've died so many times this game because my ult isn't making me unkillable. I tested it with neutral monsters and my ult worked fine, but when against Champions I can still die. Don't have any evidence as I'm still in game and can't be bothered recording. May get some soon.

replies.body:
> There is actually a 0.5 second cast time. This leaves you vulnerable.

That's actually not what I'm talking about.

If anyone still doesn't know, the smite items that cause damage can go through his ult. So playing Tryndamere this patch is really stupid which sucks because he is the highest skill cap champion that requires timed mechanics along with pitch perfect reactions. Buy a GA and let the enemy smite and pop your GA before you use your ult or get a Zilean on the team.
Against everything? Because I heard it was just with the new smite, he can be smited and killed through his ult.
